name: Marxist Moon Mission
description:
Marxist Moon Mission

Created by Logan Kemper

Go back in time to the 1970's and the space race between Russia and the United States as Cosmonaut Aleksandr Galeksei to 'reappropriate' a Russian moon rocket and change the timeline of events as we know it.

Just be prepared to fight Richard Nixon in his mech suit.

Download this epic adventure free right now and play.
